solution_line_template: On the second row, he used {first_row_blocks} - {decrease_per_row} = <<{first_row_blocks}-{decrease_per_row}={second_row_blocks}>>{second_row_blocks} blocks.
On the third row, he used {second_row_blocks} - {decrease_per_row} = <<{second_row_blocks}-{decrease_per_row}={third_row_blocks}>>{third_row_blocks} blocks.
On the fourth row, he used {third_row_blocks} - {decrease_per_row} = <<{third_row_blocks}-{decrease_per_row}={fourth_row_blocks}>>{fourth_row_blocks} blocks.
On the fifth row, he used {fourth_row_blocks} - {decrease_per_row} = <<{fourth_row_blocks}-{decrease_per_row}={fifth_row_blocks}>>{fifth_row_blocks} block.

Therefore, he used a total of {first_row_blocks} + {second_row_blocks} + {third_row_blocks} + {fourth_row_blocks} + {fifth_row_blocks} = <<{first_row_blocks}+{second_row_blocks}+{third_row_blocks}+{fourth_row_blocks}+{fifth_row_blocks}={total_blocks}>>{total_blocks} blocks.
